manipulations.insert_object: Insert a large, photorealistic green dragon soaring through the sky just behind the building on the left.
manipulations.remove_object: Remove the street sign visible in the upper right corner of the frame, blending the background seamlessly.
manipulations.replace_background: Replace the existing background with a vibrant, photorealistic cityscape at sunset, matching the light angle.
manipulations.weather_time_change: Add heavy, swirling snow to the scene, making sure the flakes appear realistically sized and blurred with motion.
manipulations.style_material_change: Change the material of the closest drummer's helmet to gold, making it reflect the surrounding light realistically.
